dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so Kazhydromet just dropped their latest forecast, and uh, it looks like June's gonna be a bit of a mixed bag, especially for Astana and Almaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so Kazhydromet just dropped their latest forecast, and uh, it looks like June's gonna be a bit of a mixed bag, especially for Astana and Almaty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? I was hoping for some consistent sunshine, you know? What's the deal for Astana first?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? I was hoping for some consistent sunshine, you know? What's the deal for Astana first?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no, um, not exactly. For Astana, tomorrow, the 25th, it's partly cloudy. Expect rain and thunderstorms, actually, especially at night and in the morning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no, um, not exactly. For Astana, tomorrow, the twenty fifth, it's partly cloudy. Expect rain and thunderstorms, actually, especially at night and in the morning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 25: Partly cloudy skies are expected. Rain and thunderstorms are likely at night and in the morning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Rain and thunderstorms? Ugh. And it's gonna be pretty cool, right? I heard it's like [interrupts] only 20-22 during the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rain and thunderstorms? Ugh. And it's gonna be pretty cool, right? I heard it's like only twenty to twenty two during the day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nighttime temperatures will be +9¦+11ÂC, rising to +20¦+22ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Yeah, super cool. Only 20-22 degrees Celsius, and really windy too, with gusts up to 18 meters a second. So, you know, bundle up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, super cool. Only twenty to twenty two degrees Celsius, and really windy too, with gusts up to eighteen meters a second. So, you know, bundle up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Northeastern winds at 9"14 m/s, with gusts reaching 15"18 m/s during the day. Nighttime temperatures will be +9¦+11ÂC, rising to +20¦+22ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. And the twenty sixth? Still cool?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yep. Still partly cloudy, more rain and storms morning and afternoon. Temperatures around 21-23 during the day. So, still kinda unstable, really.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yep. Still partly cloudy, more rain and storms morning and afternoon. Temperatures around twenty one to twenty three during the day. So, still kinda unstable, really.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 26: Partly cloudy with occasional rain and thunderstorms in the morning and afternoon. Northeastern winds at 9"14 m/s. Nighttime temperatures will be +11¦+13ÂC, and daytime temperatures +21¦+23ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so a bit of a dreary start to the week there. What about Almaty? Please tell me it's not the same.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so a bit of a dreary start to the week there. What about Almaty? Please tell me it's not the same.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Almaty is a whole different story, actually. For the 25th, Almaty is scorching!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Almaty is a whole different story, actually. For the twenty fifth, Almaty is scorching!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: daytime highs reaching a scorching +34¦+36ÂC. Expect a hot day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Scorching? How scorching are we talking?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Scorching? How scorching are we talking?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, like 34 to 36 degrees Celsius during the day. And, um, no rain expected on the 25th for them. Just really hot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, like thirty four to thirty six degrees Celsius during the day. And, um, no rain expected on the twenty fifth for them. Just really hot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 25: Partly cloudy with no precipitation. ... daytime highs reaching a scorching +34¦+36ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, that's a huge contrast! So Astana is cool and rainy, and Almaty is like a furnace.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, that's a huge contrast! So Astana is cool and rainy, and Almaty is like a furnace.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Astana... June 25: ...Rain and thunderstorms are likely at night and in the morning. ... rising to +20¦+22ÂC during the day. ... Almaty... June 25: Partly cloudy with no precipitation. ... daytime highs reaching a scorching +34¦+36ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But then, on the 26th for Almaty, it kinda shifts. The heat eases a bit, down to around 28-30, but then they get rain and thunderstorms, possibly even hail during the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But then, on the twenty sixth for Almaty, it kinda shifts. The heat eases a bit, down to around twenty eight to thirty but then they get rain and thunderstorms, possibly even hail during the day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 26: Partly cloudy. Rain and thunderstorms are expected during the day, possibly with hail. ... daytime +28¦+30ÂC. The heat will ease, but showers and storms are likely in the afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hail? Yikes. So it's not all sunshine and heat for them either then, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hail? Yikes. So it's not all sunshine and heat for them either then, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, not really. And then the 27th, it gets a bit milder for Almaty, like 26-28 degrees, but, uh, still occasional rain and storms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not really. And then the twenty seventh, it gets a bit milder for Almaty, like twenty six to twenty eight degrees, but, uh, still occasional rain and storms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 27: Partly cloudy, with occasional rain and thunderstorms. ... Temperatures will be +17¦+19ÂC at night, and +26¦+28ÂC during the day. The weather will become milder, though rain may occur.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So basically, across the board, unstable weather.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So basically, across the board, unstable weather.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Kazhydromet actually said June overall is gonna be super unstable for Kazakhstan. Like, cool spells, hot spells, heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Kazhydromet actually said June overall is gonna be super unstable for Kazakhstan. Like, cool spells, hot spells, heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On some days, dust storms are also possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Yeah, even dust storms on some days. So, um, be prepared for anything, I guess!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, even dust storms on some days. So, um, be prepared for anything, I guess!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On some days, dust storms are also possible.
